"Xitrae": "Peppy Rappy"
"Hey! Thanks for showing up. Let me reintroduce myself."
"My name is Xitrae. I serve with Central City's Supply Division. I'm in charge of managing stuff like materials and battle provisions."
"And so, here's why I called you..."
"Do you know about Rappy Assembly Sites?"
"<%me>! Thanks for coming to see me."
"Let's just jump right into it: Do you know what Rappy Assembly Sites are?"
"They're exactly what they sound like: special places where a whole bunch of Rappies gather together."
"And just recently, we've received reports of Captans also attending these Rappy Assemblies."
"This caused my Rappy-loving boss to go into hysterics. He won't stop carrying on about how \"This must be documented at all costs!\" and stuff."
"He's gotten so bad that he can barely focus on his work..."
"So, I'd really appreciate it if you could go and record some Rappies and Captans together."
"Sorry to ask, but it'd be a big help!"
"Welcome back! Thanks, you've been a big help."
"I sent the data over to my boss just a few moments ago. Hopefully now we can get back to wor--"
"MMMMAGNIFICENT! What magnificent data you've gathered!"
"Oh boy, here we go..."
"A Rappy and a Captan! A collaboration of cute, with more cute!"
"Hmmm! This big one is great too! It seems that cuteness increases in proportion to size."
"...Please calm down, sir."
"I'm really happy for you, sir, but if you're satisfied now, can you please get back to work?"
"Ahhh, wonderful... I could watch them foreverrrr..."
"...You've gotta be f--"
"Joking! I'm joking..."
"You're right. I'll have plenty of time to look at them after I finish my work."
"Ahhh, I've found a brand new source of daily motivation!"
"Anyways, I'll get back to work. And many thanks again to you, my friend!"
"Phew..."
"I swear, he'd be such a great boss if it weren't for... all that."
"A-Anyways, thanks again for all your help."
"That data you gathered will be used for actually useful research, not just Peppy Rappy's little hobby."
"Anyways, if something else comes up, I'll let ya know!"
"Supplies are the lifeline of battle!"
"Our boss would be excellent, if only it weren't for... \"that\"."
